name: Project Dream (Gomezchuy)
description:
WARNING!! The next game has a similar difficulty to retro games

**************************************************************************************

Controls:

WASD - Move

N - Attack

M - Jump

P - Pause (skill selector)

O - Select skill

**************************************************************************************

My name is Francisco Barrera and I am developing this game in my spare time, I know that I am infringing many copyrights by using graphic material from third parties, but I have had to do it since I do not have graphic designers for it and I had to use these to be able to program.

This game is not a fan game, it will be a completely original game with a story of its own.

Alternate between 5 different abilities at any one time, each one is a different genre of play. 

Tired of just jumping? Test shooting skill.

Tired of shooting? Try the swordsman, make melee attacks

Would you like to fly? You can select the UFO skill

**************************************************************************************

Are you interested in participating in this video game as a 2D artist? For more information send a message to this facebook page

¿Estás interesad@ en participar en este videojuego como artista 2D? Para más información manda un mensaje a esta página de facebook

If you speak English there is no problem, I will only ask for an apology in case the translator does not translate well what I will try to say hehehe

PS2: The game has certain bugs and the levels are not completely finished
